long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Let me guess your current process for arranging a property viewing? You see something you like the look of online, you then have to spend 15-20 minutes calling up an estate agent, going back and forth with lots of personal information, before finally arranging a viewing.

Viewmate cuts all of this out - in 2-clicks, Viewmate will automatically arrange a viewing with the estate agent, and drop a calendar invite into your diary. As simple as that.
